hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: Angular & Java Developer crafting scalable, user-centric web applications that are rigorously tested and optimized. Available for a work-study placement starting December 2024 to join an IT services firm and contribute to ambitious projects.

paragraphs.first: Passionate about creation and solving technical challenges, I first worked as a live performance technician from 2011 to 2020, a period that taught me rigor, adaptability, and daily project management. I then worked as a sales associate at Lacoste until 2024, where I strengthened my customer service skills and communication abilities.
paragraphs.second: I will complete my intensive bootcamp at La Capsule in December 2024, and since early 2025, I've challenged myself to create one web project per week. Each mini-MVP has allowed me to explore new features, push my technical limits, and refine my global vision of what makes a high-performance website. In parallel, I continue my self-taught education â€” after React and Next.js, I started learning Angular and Java in early May 2025 to broaden my skill set.
paragraphs.third: I am currently looking for an apprenticeship position within a digital services company to evolve in a true team environment, benefit from a formative 'step up', and eventually share my experience with others (following the 'each one teach one' philosophy). Outside of coding, I'm an avid gamer: these days, it's Valorant that occupies my evenings!
